---
title: "Billboard Charts Analysis"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(forcats)
library(patchwork)
library(gridExtra)
charts <- read_csv("~/Desktop/data/charts.csv")


```

```{r}
#| echo: false

charts %>%
  arrange(desc(`weeks-on-board`)) %>%
  slice_max(`weeks-on-board`, n = 10) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(song, `weeks-on-board`), y = `weeks-on-board`, fill = artist)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Top 10 Songs by Weeks on Chart",
       x = "Song", y = "Weeks on Chart") +
  theme_minimal()

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
top_artists <- charts %>%
  count(artist, sort = TRUE) %>%
  slice_max(n, n = 5) %>%
  pull(artist)

charts %>%
  filter(artist %in% top_artists) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = artist, y = rank, fill = artist)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(title = "Rank Distribution for Top 5 Artists",
       x = "Artist", y = "Rank") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")



```

![](http://127.0.0.1:12055/chunk_output/B3C0879B968d8387/4C9A947E/cav7nlmeknx41/00002f.png)

```{r}
#| echo: false
top_artists <- charts %>%
  count(artist, sort = TRUE) %>%
  slice_max(n, n = 10)

violin_plot <- charts %>%
  filter(artist %in% top_artists$artist) %>%
  mutate(artist = fct_reorder(artist, rank, .fun = median)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = artist, y = rank, fill = artist, color = artist)) +
  geom_violin(trim = FALSE) +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(title = "Rank Distribution of Top 10 Artists", x = "Artist", y = "Rank") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 75,hjust = 1))

artist_table <- tableGrob(data.frame(Artist = top_artists$artist))

violin_plot + inset_element(artist_table, left = 1.05, bottom = 0, right = 1.4, top = 5)


```
